blogPost.title: The Sussexes are funding their life in California through media deals with Spotify and Netflix. Will it prove as lucrative as the royal engagements the couple left behind? https://t.co/Qyk42K3gw4
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 苏塞克斯夫妇正在通过与Spotify和Netflix的媒体交易来资助他们在加利福尼亚的生活。它会被证明和这对夫妇留下的皇家订婚一样有利可图吗？https://t.co/Qyk42K3gw4。
蘇塞克斯夫婦正在通過與Spotify和Netflix的媒體交易來資助他們在加利福尼亞的生活。它會被證明和這對夫婦留下的皇家訂婚一樣有利可圖嗎？https://t.co/Qyk42K3gw4。

previous.title: The cheapest and greenest providers of power will no longer get priority in selling to Mexico's grid. Instead it will go to the state electricity company https://t.co/3zBLO9rhtR

localize.full_text: 最便宜和最绿色的电力供应商将不再获得向墨西哥电网出售电力的优先权。取而代之的将是国家电力公司https://t.co/3zBLO9rhtR。
最便宜和最綠色的電力供應商將不再獲得向墨西哥電網出售電力的優先權。取而代之的將是國家電力公司https://t.co/3zBLO9rhtR。

next.title: Joe Biden’s stimulus bill will add fiscal rocket fuel to an already fiery economic-policy mix. It's a gamble for America and the world. Our cover this week https://t.co/wQg5hmuono https://t.co/9tc3zNWe0J

localize.full_text: 乔-拜登的经济刺激法案将给本已火热的经济政策组合增添财政火箭燃料。这对美国和世界都是一场赌博。我们本周的封面https://t.co/wQg5hmuono https://t.co/9tc3zNWe0J
喬-拜登的經濟刺激法案將給本已火熱的經濟政策組合增添財政火箭燃料。這對美國和世界都是一場賭博。我們本週的封面https://t.co/wQg5hmuono https://t.co/9tc3zNWe0J
